name: "Moving from WhatsApp" ðŸ’¬ - Template
description:
Tell your friends where to reach you from now on


A while ago I deleted WhatsApp and adjusted my profile picture so that people can see where they can reach me instead.


  • Now you can generate your very own profile picture
  • Easy customisation of personal messenger preference
  • Simple and subtle way of letting people know that WhatsApp is not only a disaster privacy-wise, but pretty outdated as well :)
  • 15+ messengers supported (Telegram, Element, Signal, Slack, Teams, Wickr, Viber, Conversations (XMPP), Instagram, DeltaChat...)
  • Fully responsive. Need more options? Just increase the layer size.
